lines.text: I'll tell you a secret. I didn't do it for science. And I didn't do it for glory. I'M JUST MEAN!
Blind kids, a midget, dykes on bikes... we could start a side-show!
Jeez, Dad, maybe if you don't eat anybody, nobody'll notice you're a zombie.
If GOD had wanted me to be like normal people, he would have made me look like normal people...
[Bob Willum and a grieving widow are at a grave]
[He notices sand leaking out of the coffin, as it is devoid of the corpse]
Well... what the fuck, why dwell on it?
You're the Sluts! Try and act like it!
I'm going to get me some meat.

[an army of zombies attacks the town]
Shoot!
We can't. They're us. They're good people.
